dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Impressive… I expected no less of the Red Gaze’s minions.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Oh boy, there goes Hopkins again, being clumsy with his tongue… I’ll apologize in his stead~ Heheh.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: What’s taking you so long though, Hopkins? Hemorrhoids acting up again?

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: W-What—no I’m not! Dunno what you mean…
Hopkins got up after a bit of dawdling.
His pockets were laden with something, but I decided not to bother pointing it out.
